page.title: 17SLIMNASTICS AND DANCING
page.content: {SLIMNASTICS The group meet at the Village Hall on a Tuesday afternoon from 1.00-3.00 every week in the school term. Weighing comes first followed by warm-up exercises. Different exercises for the different parts of the body then follow followed by a cool-down and relaxation. After that the ladies take it in turns to make the tea during which they have a discussion session on topics such as hygene, food etc. {DANCING A dancing class is run every Saturday morning for 4-8 year olds to learn Ballet and Tap dancing. There is also a Tap dancing class for teenagers and the children work towards the Royal Academy of Dance Examinations. The classes are run by Mrs Skaife of North Kyme.
